00079 #include <stdio.h>
00080 #include <math.h>
00081 #include "midas.h"
00082 #include "ybos.h"
00083 
00084 typedef struct {
00085 
00086    /* ODB keys */
00087    HNDLE hKeyRoot, hKeyDemand, hKeyMeasured, hKeyCurrent;
00088 
00089    /* globals */
00090    INT num_channels;
00091    INT format;
00092    DWORD last_update;
00093    INT last_channel;
00094 
00095    /* items in /Variables record */
00096    char *names;
00097    float *demand;
00098    float *measured;
00099    float *current;
00100 
00101    /* items in /Settings */
00102    float *update_threshold;
00103    float *update_threshold_current;
00104    float *voltage_limit;
00105    float *current_limit;
00106    float *rampup_speed;
00107    float *rampdown_speed;
00108 
00109    /* mirror arrays */
00110    float *demand_mirror;
00111    float *measured_mirror;
00112    float *current_mirror;
00113    DWORD *last_change;
00114 
00115    void **driver;
00116    INT *channel_offset;
00117    void **dd_info;
00118    DWORD *flags;
00119 
00120 } HV_INFO;
00121 
00122 #define DRIVER(_i) ((INT (*)(INT cmd, ...))(hv_info->driver[_i]))
00123 
00124 #ifndef abs
00125 #define abs(a) (((a) < 0)   ? -(a) : (a))
00126 #endif

00130 static void free_mem(HV_INFO * hv_info)
00131 {
00132    free(hv_info->names);
00133    free(hv_info->demand);
00134    free(hv_info->measured);
00135    free(hv_info->current);
00136 
00137    free(hv_info->update_threshold);
00138    free(hv_info->update_threshold_current);
00139    free(hv_info->voltage_limit);
00140    free(hv_info->current_limit);
00141    free(hv_info->rampup_speed);
00142    free(hv_info->rampdown_speed);
00143 
00144    free(hv_info->demand_mirror);
00145    free(hv_info->measured_mirror);
00146    free(hv_info->current_mirror);
00147    free(hv_info->last_change);
00148 
00149    free(hv_info->dd_info);
00150    free(hv_info->channel_offset);
00151    free(hv_info->driver);
00152    free(hv_info->flags);
00153 
00154    free(hv_info);
00155 }

00158 
00159 INT hv_read(EQUIPMENT * pequipment, int channel)
00160 {
00161    int i, j, status;
00162    float max_diff;
00163    DWORD act_time, min_time;
00164    BOOL changed;
00165    HV_INFO *hv_info;
00166    HNDLE hDB;
00167 
00168    hv_info = (HV_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00169    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00170 
00171    if (channel == -1) {
00172       for (i = 0, j = 0; pequipment->driver[i].name[0]; i++) {
00173          status = pequipment->driver[i].dd(CMD_GET_ALL,
00174                                            pequipment->driver[i].dd_info,
00175                                            pequipment->driver[i].channels,
00176                                            hv_info->measured + j);
00177          status = pequipment->driver[i].dd(CMD_GET_CURRENT_ALL,
00178                                            pequipment->driver[i].dd_info,
00179                                            pequipment->driver[i].channels,
00180                                            hv_info->current + j);
00181 
00182          j += pequipment->driver[i].channels;
00183       }
00184    } else {
00185       status = DRIVER(channel) (CMD_GET, hv_info->dd_info[channel],
00186                                 channel - hv_info->channel_offset[channel],
00187                                 &hv_info->measured[channel]);
00188       status = DRIVER(channel) (CMD_GET_CURRENT, hv_info->dd_info[channel],
00189                                 channel - hv_info->channel_offset[channel],
00190                                 &hv_info->current[channel]);
00191    }
00192 
00193    /* check how much channels have changed since last ODB update */
00194    act_time = ss_millitime();
00195 
00196    /* check for update measured */
00197    max_diff = 0.f;
00198    min_time = 10000;
00199    changed = FALSE;
00200    for (i = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++) {
00201       if (abs(hv_info->measured[i] - hv_info->measured_mirror[i]) > max_diff)
00202          max_diff = abs(hv_info->measured[i] - hv_info->measured_mirror[i]);
00203 
00204       if (abs(hv_info->measured[i] - hv_info->measured_mirror[i]) >
00205           hv_info->update_threshold[i])
00206          changed = TRUE;
00207 
00208       if (act_time - hv_info->last_change[i] < min_time)
00209          min_time = act_time - hv_info->last_change[i];
00210    }
00211 
00212    /* update if change is more than update_sensitivity or less than 2sec ago 
00213       or last update is older than a minute */
00214    if (changed || (min_time < 2000 && max_diff > 0) ||
00215        act_time - hv_info->last_update > 60000) {
00216       hv_info->last_update = act_time;
00217 
00218       for (i = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++)
00219          hv_info->measured_mirror[i] = hv_info->measured[i];
00220 
00221       db_set_data(hDB, hv_info->hKeyMeasured, hv_info->measured,
00222                   sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels, hv_info->num_channels,
00223                   TID_FLOAT);
00224 
00225       pequipment->odb_out++;
00226    }
00227 
00228    /* check for update current */
00229    max_diff = 0.f;
00230    min_time = 10000;
00231    changed = FALSE;
00232    for (i = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++) {
00233       if (abs(hv_info->current[i] - hv_info->current_mirror[i]) > max_diff)
00234          max_diff = abs(hv_info->current[i] - hv_info->current_mirror[i]);
00235 
00236       if (abs(hv_info->current[i] - hv_info->current_mirror[i]) >
00237           hv_info->update_threshold_current[i])
00238          changed = TRUE;
00239 
00240       if (act_time - hv_info->last_change[i] < min_time)
00241          min_time = act_time - hv_info->last_change[i];
00242    }
00243 
00244    /* update if change is more than update_sensitivity or less than 2sec ago */
00245    if (changed || (min_time < 2000 && max_diff > 0)) {
00246       for (i = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++)
00247          hv_info->current_mirror[i] = hv_info->current[i];
00248 
00249       db_set_data(hDB, hv_info->hKeyCurrent, hv_info->current,
00250                   sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels, hv_info->num_channels,
00251                   TID_FLOAT);
00252 
00253       pequipment->odb_out++;
00254    }
00255 
00256    return status;
00257 }
00258 
00259 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00260 
00261 INT hv_ramp(HV_INFO * hv_info)
00262 {
00263    INT i, status, switch_tag;
00264    float delta, ramp_speed;
00265 
00266    for (i = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++) {
00267       if (hv_info->demand[i] != hv_info->demand_mirror[i]) {
00268          /* check if to ramp up or down */
00269          if ((hv_info->demand[i] >= 0.f) && (hv_info->demand_mirror[i] > 0.f)) {
00270             switch_tag = FALSE;
00271             if (hv_info->demand[i] > hv_info->demand_mirror[i])
00272                ramp_speed = hv_info->rampup_speed[i];
00273             else
00274                ramp_speed = hv_info->rampdown_speed[i];
00275          }
00276          if ((hv_info->demand[i] >= 0.f) && (hv_info->demand_mirror[i] < 0.f)) {
00277             switch_tag = TRUE;
00278             ramp_speed = hv_info->rampdown_speed[i];
00279          }
00280          if ((hv_info->demand[i] < 0.f) && (hv_info->demand_mirror[i] > 0.f)) {
00281             switch_tag = TRUE;
00282             ramp_speed = hv_info->rampdown_speed[i];
00283          }
00284          if ((hv_info->demand[i] < 0.f) && (hv_info->demand_mirror[i] < 0.f)) {
00285             switch_tag = FALSE;
00286             if (hv_info->demand[i] > hv_info->demand_mirror[i])
00287                ramp_speed = hv_info->rampdown_speed[i];
00288             else
00289                ramp_speed = hv_info->rampup_speed[i];
00290          }
00291          if (hv_info->demand_mirror[i] == 0.f) {
00292             switch_tag = FALSE;
00293             ramp_speed = hv_info->rampup_speed[i];
00294          }
00295 
00296          if (ramp_speed == 0.f)
00297             if (switch_tag)
00298                hv_info->demand_mirror[i] = 0.f; /* go to zero */
00299             else
00300                hv_info->demand_mirror[i] = hv_info->demand[i];  /* step directly to the new high voltage */
00301          else {
00302             delta = (float) ((ss_millitime() -
00303                               hv_info->last_change[i]) / 1000.0 * ramp_speed);
00304             if (hv_info->demand[i] > hv_info->demand_mirror[i])
00305                hv_info->demand_mirror[i] =
00306                    MIN(hv_info->demand[i], hv_info->demand_mirror[i] + delta);
00307             else
00308                hv_info->demand_mirror[i] =
00309                    MAX(hv_info->demand[i], hv_info->demand_mirror[i] - delta);
00310          }
00311          status = DRIVER(i) (CMD_SET, hv_info->dd_info[i],
00312                              i - hv_info->channel_offset[i], hv_info->demand_mirror[i]);
00313          hv_info->last_change[i] = ss_millitime();
00314       }
00315    }
00316 
00317    return status;
00318 }
00319 
00320 
00321 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00322 
00323 void hv_demand(INT hDB, INT hKey, void *info)
00324 {
00325    INT i, status, n, offset;
00326    HV_INFO *hv_info;
00327    EQUIPMENT *pequipment;
00328 
00329    pequipment = (EQUIPMENT *) info;
00330    hv_info = (HV_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00331 
00332    /* check for voltage limit */
00333    for (i = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++)
00334       if (hv_info->demand[i] > hv_info->voltage_limit[i])
00335          hv_info->demand[i] = hv_info->voltage_limit[i];
00336 
00337    /* check how many channels differ */
00338    for (i = 1, n = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++)
00339       if ((fabs(hv_info->demand[i]) > fabs(hv_info->demand_mirror[i])
00340            && hv_info->rampup_speed[i] == 0)
00341           || (fabs(hv_info->demand[i]) < fabs(hv_info->demand_mirror[i])
00342               && hv_info->rampdown_speed[i] == 0))
00343          n++;
00344 
00345    /* if more than 10% differ, use SET_ALL command which is faster in that case */
00346    if (n > hv_info->num_channels / 10) {
00347       for (i = 0, offset = 0; pequipment->driver[i].name[0]; i++) {
00348          if ((pequipment->driver[i].flags & DF_READ_ONLY) == 0)
00349             status = pequipment->driver[i].dd(CMD_SET_ALL, pequipment->driver[i].dd_info,
00350                                               pequipment->driver[i].channels,
00351                                               hv_info->demand + offset);
00352 
00353          offset += pequipment->driver[i].channels;
00354       }
00355 
00356       for (i = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++) {
00357          if (hv_info->demand[i] != hv_info->demand_mirror[i])
00358             hv_info->last_change[i] = ss_millitime();
00359          hv_info->demand_mirror[i] = hv_info->demand[i];
00360       }
00361 
00362       /* read back all channels */
00363       hv_read(pequipment, -1);
00364    } else
00365       /* set individual channels only if demand value differs */
00366       for (i = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++)
00367          if (hv_info->demand[i] != hv_info->demand_mirror[i] ||
00368              fabs(hv_info->measured[i] - hv_info->demand[i]) > 100.f) {
00369             hv_info->last_change[i] = ss_millitime();
00370          }
00371 
00372    pequipment->odb_in++;
00373 
00374    /* execute one ramping */
00375    hv_ramp(hv_info);
00376 }

00378 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00379 
00380 void hv_current_limit(INT hDB, INT hKey, void *info)
00381 {
00382    INT i;
00383    HV_INFO *hv_info;
00384    EQUIPMENT *pequipment;
00385 
00386    pequipment = (EQUIPMENT *) info;
00387    hv_info = (HV_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00388 
00389    hv_info = ((EQUIPMENT *) info)->cd_info;
00390 
00391    /* check for voltage limit */
00392    for (i = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++)
00393       DRIVER(i) (CMD_SET_CURRENT_LIMIT, hv_info->dd_info[i],
00394                  i - hv_info->channel_offset[i], hv_info->current_limit[i]);
00395 
00396    pequipment->odb_in++;
00397 }

00399 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00400 
00401 void hv_update_label(INT hDB, INT hKey, void *info)
00402 {
00403    INT i, status;
00404    HV_INFO *hv_info;
00405    EQUIPMENT *pequipment;
00406 
00407    pequipment = (EQUIPMENT *) info;
00408    hv_info = (HV_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00409 
00410    /* update channel labels based on the midas channel names */
00411    for (i = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++)
00412       status = DRIVER(i) (CMD_SET_LABEL, hv_info->dd_info[i],
00413                           i - hv_info->channel_offset[i],
00414                           hv_info->names + NAME_LENGTH * i);
00415 }

00417 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00418 
00419 INT hv_init(EQUIPMENT * pequipment)
00420 {
00421    int status, size, i, j, index, offset;
00422    char str[256];
00423    HNDLE hDB, hKey, hNames;
00424    HV_INFO *hv_info;
00425 
00426    /* allocate private data */
00427    pequipment->cd_info = calloc(1, sizeof(HV_INFO));
00428    hv_info = (HV_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00429 
00430    /* get class driver root key */
00431    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00432    sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s", pequipment->name);
00433    db_create_key(hDB, 0, str, TID_KEY);
00434    db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hv_info->hKeyRoot);
00435 
00436    /* save event format */
00437    size = sizeof(str);
00438    db_get_value(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, "Common/Format", str, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00439 
00440    if (equal_ustring(str, "Fixed"))
00441       hv_info->format = FORMAT_FIXED;
00442    else if (equal_ustring(str, "MIDAS"))
00443       hv_info->format = FORMAT_MIDAS;
00444    else if (equal_ustring(str, "YBOS"))
00445       hv_info->format = FORMAT_YBOS;
00446 
00447    /* count total number of channels */
00448    for (i = 0, hv_info->num_channels = 0; pequipment->driver[i].name[0]; i++) {
00449       if (pequipment->driver[i].channels == 0) {
00450          cm_msg(MERROR, "hv_init", "Driver with zero channels not allowed");
00451          return FE_ERR_ODB;
00452       }
00453 
00454       hv_info->num_channels += pequipment->driver[i].channels;
00455    }
00456 
00457    if (hv_info->num_channels == 0) {
00458       cm_msg(MERROR, "hv_init", "No channels found in device driver list");
00459       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00460    }
00461 
00462    /* Allocate memory for buffers */
00463    hv_info->names = (char *) calloc(hv_info->num_channels, NAME_LENGTH);
00464 
00465    hv_info->demand = (float *) calloc(hv_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00466    hv_info->measured = (float *) calloc(hv_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00467    hv_info->current = (float *) calloc(hv_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00468 
00469    hv_info->update_threshold = (float *) calloc(hv_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00470    hv_info->update_threshold_current =
00471        (float *) calloc(hv_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00472    hv_info->voltage_limit = (float *) calloc(hv_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00473    hv_info->current_limit = (float *) calloc(hv_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00474    hv_info->rampup_speed = (float *) calloc(hv_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00475    hv_info->rampdown_speed = (float *) calloc(hv_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00476 
00477    hv_info->demand_mirror = (float *) calloc(hv_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00478    hv_info->measured_mirror = (float *) calloc(hv_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00479    hv_info->current_mirror = (float *) calloc(hv_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00480    hv_info->last_change = (DWORD *) calloc(hv_info->num_channels, sizeof(DWORD));
00481 
00482    hv_info->dd_info = (void *) calloc(hv_info->num_channels, sizeof(void *));
00483    hv_info->channel_offset = (INT *) calloc(hv_info->num_channels, sizeof(INT));
00484    hv_info->driver = (void *) calloc(hv_info->num_channels, sizeof(void *));
00485    hv_info->flags = (DWORD *) calloc(hv_info->num_channels, sizeof(void *));
00486 
00487    if (!hv_info->flags) {
00488       cm_msg(MERROR, "hv_init", "Not enough memory");
00489       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00490    }
00491 
00492   /*---- Create/Read settings ----*/
00493 
00494    /* Names */
00495    for (i = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++)
00496       sprintf(hv_info->names + NAME_LENGTH * i, "Default%%CH %d", i);
00497    db_merge_data(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Names",
00498                  hv_info->names, NAME_LENGTH * hv_info->num_channels,
00499                  hv_info->num_channels, TID_STRING);
00500 
00501    /* Update threshold */
00502    for (i = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++)
00503       hv_info->update_threshold[i] = 2.f;       /* default 2V */
00504    db_merge_data(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Update Threshold Measured",
00505                  hv_info->update_threshold, sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels,
00506                  hv_info->num_channels, TID_FLOAT);
00507 
00508    /* Update threshold current */
00509    for (i = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++)
00510       hv_info->update_threshold_current[i] = 2.f;       /* default 2uA */
00511    db_merge_data(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Update Threshold Current",
00512                  hv_info->update_threshold_current, sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels,
00513                  hv_info->num_channels, TID_FLOAT);
00514 
00515    /* Voltage limit */
00516    for (i = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++)
00517       hv_info->voltage_limit[i] = 3000.f;       /* default 3000V */
00518    db_merge_data(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Voltage Limit",
00519                  hv_info->voltage_limit, sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels,
00520                  hv_info->num_channels, TID_FLOAT);
00521    db_find_key(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Voltage Limit", &hKey);
00522    db_open_record(hDB, hKey, hv_info->voltage_limit,
00523                   sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels, MODE_READ, NULL, NULL);
00524 
00525    /* Current limit */
00526    for (i = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++)
00527       hv_info->current_limit[i] = 3000.f;       /* default 3000V */
00528    db_merge_data(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Current Limit",
00529                  hv_info->current_limit, sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels,
00530                  hv_info->num_channels, TID_FLOAT);
00531    db_find_key(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Current Limit", &hKey);
00532    db_open_record(hDB, hKey, hv_info->current_limit,
00533                   sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels, MODE_READ, hv_current_limit,
00534                   pequipment);
00535 
00536    /* Ramp speed */
00537    for (i = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++) {
00538       /* disabled by default */
00539       hv_info->rampup_speed[i] = 0.f;
00540       hv_info->rampdown_speed[i] = 0.f;
00541    }
00542 
00543    db_merge_data(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Ramp Up Speed",
00544                  hv_info->rampup_speed, sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels,
00545                  hv_info->num_channels, TID_FLOAT);
00546    db_find_key(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Ramp Up Speed", &hKey);
00547    db_open_record(hDB, hKey, hv_info->rampup_speed, sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels,
00548                   MODE_READ, NULL, NULL);
00549 
00550    db_merge_data(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Ramp Down Speed",
00551                  hv_info->rampdown_speed, sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels,
00552                  hv_info->num_channels, TID_FLOAT);
00553    db_find_key(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Ramp Down Speed", &hKey);
00554    db_open_record(hDB, hKey, hv_info->rampdown_speed,
00555                   sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels, MODE_READ, NULL, NULL);
00556 
00557   /*---- Create/Read variables ----*/
00558 
00559    /* Demand */
00560    db_merge_data(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, "Variables/Demand",
00561                  hv_info->demand, sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels,
00562                  hv_info->num_channels, TID_FLOAT);
00563    db_find_key(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, "Variables/Demand", &hv_info->hKeyDemand);
00564    db_open_record(hDB, hv_info->hKeyDemand, hv_info->demand,
00565                   hv_info->num_channels * sizeof(float), MODE_READ, hv_demand,
00566                   pequipment);
00567 
00568    /* Measured */
00569    db_merge_data(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, "Variables/Measured",
00570                  hv_info->measured, sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels,
00571                  hv_info->num_channels, TID_FLOAT);
00572    db_find_key(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, "Variables/Measured", &hv_info->hKeyMeasured);
00573    memcpy(hv_info->measured_mirror, hv_info->measured,
00574           hv_info->num_channels * sizeof(float));
00575 
00576    /* Current */
00577    db_merge_data(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, "Variables/Current",
00578                  hv_info->current, sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels,
00579                  hv_info->num_channels, TID_FLOAT);
00580    db_find_key(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, "Variables/Current", &hv_info->hKeyCurrent);
00581    memcpy(hv_info->current_mirror, hv_info->current,
00582           hv_info->num_channels * sizeof(float));
00583 
00584   /*---- Initialize device drivers ----*/
00585 
00586    /* call init method */
00587    for (i = 0; pequipment->driver[i].name[0]; i++) {
00588       sprintf(str, "Settings/Devices/%s", pequipment->driver[i].name);
00589       status = db_find_key(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, str, &hKey);
00590       if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00591          db_create_key(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, str, TID_KEY);
00592          status = db_find_key(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, str, &hKey);
00593          if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00594             cm_msg(MERROR, "hv_init", "Cannot create %s entry in online database", str);
00595             free_mem(hv_info);
00596             return FE_ERR_ODB;
00597          }
00598       }
00599 
00600       status = pequipment->driver[i].dd(CMD_INIT, hKey, &pequipment->driver[i].dd_info,
00601                                         pequipment->driver[i].channels,
00602                                         pequipment->driver[i].flags,
00603                                         pequipment->driver[i].bd);
00604       if (status != FE_SUCCESS) {
00605          free_mem(hv_info);
00606          return status;
00607       }
00608    }
00609 
00610    /* compose device driver channel assignment */
00611    for (i = 0, j = 0, index = 0, offset = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++, j++) {
00612       while (j >= pequipment->driver[index].channels && pequipment->driver[index].name[0]) {
00613          offset += j;
00614          index++;
00615          j = 0;
00616       }
00617 
00618       hv_info->driver[i] = pequipment->driver[index].dd;
00619       hv_info->dd_info[i] = pequipment->driver[index].dd_info;
00620       hv_info->channel_offset[i] = offset;
00621       hv_info->flags[i] = pequipment->driver[index].flags;
00622    }
00623 
00624   /*---- get default names from device driver ----*/
00625    size = NAME_LENGTH * sizeof(char);
00626 
00627    db_find_key(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Names", &hKey);
00628    for (i = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++) {
00629       DRIVER(i) (CMD_GET_DEFAULT_NAME, hv_info->dd_info[i],
00630                  i - hv_info->channel_offset[i], hv_info->names + NAME_LENGTH * i);
00631       db_set_data_index(hDB, hKey, hv_info->names + NAME_LENGTH * i, size, i, TID_STRING);
00632    }
00633 
00634   /*---- set labels form midas SC names ----*/
00635    for (i = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++) {
00636       DRIVER(i) (CMD_SET_LABEL, hv_info->dd_info[i],
00637                  i - hv_info->channel_offset[i], hv_info->names + NAME_LENGTH * i);
00638    }
00639 
00640    /* open hotlink on channel names */
00641    if (db_find_key(hDB, hv_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Names", &hNames) == DB_SUCCESS)
00642       db_open_record(hDB, hNames, hv_info->names, NAME_LENGTH * hv_info->num_channels,
00643                      MODE_READ, hv_update_label, pequipment);
00644 
00645    /* set current limits and initial demand values */
00646    printf("\n");
00647    for (i = 0, offset = 0; pequipment->driver[i].name[0]; i++) {
00648       for (j = 0; j < pequipment->driver[i].channels; j++)
00649          hv_info->demand_mirror[offset + j] =
00650              MIN(hv_info->demand[offset + j], hv_info->voltage_limit[offset + j]);
00651 
00652       DRIVER(i + offset) (CMD_SET_CURRENT_LIMIT_ALL, pequipment->driver[i].dd_info,
00653                           pequipment->driver[i].channels,
00654                           hv_info->current_limit + offset);
00655 
00656       printf("\n");
00657 
00658       if ((hv_info->flags[i] & DF_PRIO_DEVICE) == 0)
00659          status = DRIVER(i + offset) (CMD_SET_ALL, pequipment->driver[i].dd_info,
00660                                       pequipment->driver[i].channels,
00661                                       hv_info->demand_mirror + offset);
00662       if (status != FE_SUCCESS)
00663          return status;
00664 
00665       offset += pequipment->driver[i].channels;
00666    }
00667    printf("\n");
00668 
00669    /* get demand valus from device if asked for */
00670    for (i = 0; i < hv_info->num_channels; i++) {
00671       if (hv_info->flags[i] & DF_PRIO_DEVICE) {
00672          DRIVER(i) (CMD_GET_DEMAND, hv_info->dd_info[i],
00673                     i - hv_info->channel_offset[i], &hv_info->demand[i]);
00674          hv_info->demand_mirror[i] = hv_info->demand[i];
00675       }
00676    }
00677    db_set_record(hDB, hv_info->hKeyDemand, hv_info->demand,
00678                  hv_info->num_channels * sizeof(float), 0);
00679 
00680    /* initially read all channels if not too much */
00681    if (hv_info->num_channels < 256)
00682       hv_read(pequipment, -1);
00683 
00684    return FE_SUCCESS;
00685 }
00686 
00687 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00688 
00689 INT hv_exit(EQUIPMENT * pequipment)
00690 {
00691    INT i;
00692 
00693    free_mem((HV_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info);
00694 
00695    /* call exit method of device drivers */
00696    for (i = 0; pequipment->driver[i].dd != NULL; i++)
00697       pequipment->driver[i].dd(CMD_EXIT, pequipment->driver[i].dd_info);
00698 
00699    return FE_SUCCESS;
00700 }
00701 
00702 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00703 
00704 INT hv_idle(EQUIPMENT * pequipment)
00705 {
00706    INT act, status;
00707    DWORD act_time;
00708    HV_INFO *hv_info;
00709 
00710    hv_info = (HV_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00711 
00712    /* do ramping */
00713    hv_ramp(hv_info);
00714 
00715    /* select next measurement channel */
00716    act_time = ss_millitime();
00717    act = (hv_info->last_channel + 1) % hv_info->num_channels;
00718 
00719    /* look for the next channel recently updated */
00720    while (!(act_time - hv_info->last_change[act] < 5000 ||
00721             (act_time - hv_info->last_change[act] < 20000
00722              && abs(hv_info->measured[act] - hv_info->demand[act]) >
00723              2 * hv_info->update_threshold[act]))) {
00724       act = (act + 1) % hv_info->num_channels;
00725       if (act == hv_info->last_channel) {
00726          act = (hv_info->last_channel + 1) % hv_info->num_channels;
00727          break;
00728       }
00729    }
00730 
00731    /* measure channel */
00732    status = hv_read(pequipment, act);
00733    hv_info->last_channel = act;
00734 
00735    return status;
00736 }
00737 
00738 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00739 
00740 INT cd_hv_read(char *pevent, int offset)
00741 {
00742    float *pdata;
00743    DWORD *pdw;
00744    HV_INFO *hv_info;
00745    EQUIPMENT *pequipment;
00746 
00747    pequipment = *((EQUIPMENT **) pevent);
00748    hv_info = (HV_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00749 
00750    if (hv_info->format == FORMAT_FIXED) {
00751       memcpy(pevent, hv_info->demand, sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels);
00752       pevent += sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels;
00753 
00754       memcpy(pevent, hv_info->measured, sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels);
00755       pevent += sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels;
00756 
00757       memcpy(pevent, hv_info->current, sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels);
00758       pevent += sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels;
00759 
00760       return 3 * sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels;
00761    } else if (hv_info->format == FORMAT_MIDAS) {
00762       bk_init(pevent);
00763 
00764       /* create DMND bank */
00765       bk_create(pevent, "DMND", TID_FLOAT, &pdata);
00766       memcpy(pdata, hv_info->demand, sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels);
00767       pdata += hv_info->num_channels;
00768       bk_close(pevent, pdata);
00769 
00770       /* create MSRD bank */
00771       bk_create(pevent, "MSRD", TID_FLOAT, &pdata);
00772       memcpy(pdata, hv_info->measured, sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels);
00773       pdata += hv_info->num_channels;
00774       bk_close(pevent, pdata);
00775 
00776       /* create CRNT bank */
00777       bk_create(pevent, "CRNT", TID_FLOAT, &pdata);
00778       memcpy(pdata, hv_info->current, sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels);
00779       pdata += hv_info->num_channels;
00780       bk_close(pevent, pdata);
00781 
00782       return bk_size(pevent);
00783    } else if (hv_info->format == FORMAT_YBOS) {
00784       ybk_init((DWORD *) pevent);
00785 
00786       /* create EVID bank */
00787       ybk_create((DWORD *) pevent, "EVID", I4_BKTYPE, (DWORD *) (&pdw));
00788       *(pdw)++ = EVENT_ID(pevent);      /* Event_ID + Mask */
00789       *(pdw)++ = SERIAL_NUMBER(pevent); /* Serial number */
00790       *(pdw)++ = TIME_STAMP(pevent);    /* Time Stamp */
00791       ybk_close((DWORD *) pevent, pdw);
00792 
00793       /* create DMND bank */
00794       ybk_create((DWORD *) pevent, "DMND", F4_BKTYPE, (DWORD *) & pdata);
00795       memcpy(pdata, hv_info->demand, sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels);
00796       pdata += hv_info->num_channels;
00797       ybk_close((DWORD *) pevent, pdata);
00798 
00799       /* create MSRD bank */
00800       ybk_create((DWORD *) pevent, "MSRD", F4_BKTYPE, (DWORD *) & pdata);
00801       memcpy(pdata, hv_info->measured, sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels);
00802       pdata += hv_info->num_channels;
00803       ybk_close((DWORD *) pevent, pdata);
00804 
00805       /* create CRNT bank */
00806       ybk_create((DWORD *) pevent, "CRNT", F4_BKTYPE, (DWORD *) & pdata);
00807       memcpy(pdata, hv_info->current, sizeof(float) * hv_info->num_channels);
00808       pdata += hv_info->num_channels;
00809       ybk_close((DWORD *) pevent, pdata);
00810 
00811       return ybk_size((DWORD *) pevent);
00812    }
00813 
00814    return 0;
00815 }
00816 
00817 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00818 
00819 INT cd_hv(INT cmd, PEQUIPMENT pequipment)
00820 {
00821    INT status;
00822 
00823    switch (cmd) {
00824    case CMD_INIT:
00825       status = hv_init(pequipment);
00826       break;
00827 
00828    case CMD_EXIT:
00829       status = hv_exit(pequipment);
00830       break;
00831 
00832    case CMD_IDLE:
00833       status = hv_idle(pequipment);
00834       break;
00835 
00836    default:
00837       cm_msg(MERROR, "HV class driver", "Received unknown command %d", cmd);
00838       status = FE_ERR_DRIVER;
00839       break;
00840 
00841    }
00842 
00843    return status;
00844 }
